tamos.network.set_distance_function¶

tamos.network.set_distance_function(distance_function)¶

Defines the function that gives the distance in km between two hubs.

Parameters

  • distance_function (callable, f(u, v), that meets the following definition:) –

  • [x (* u is a list) –

  • v). (y] where x and y are space coordinates of point u (same for) –

  • f(u (*) –

  • f(v (v) =) –

  • u) –

  • f(u –

  • km (v) returns a distance in) –

Notes

Default distance function is scipy.spatial.distance.cityblock.
